roleset.name: (re)take a strong defensive position
roleset.note: RETRENCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'retrench' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from retrench.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: bad stylistics
example.text: ''Today, he frets, exports and business investment spending may be insufficient to pick up the slack if stock prices sink this week and if consumers retrench in reaction.
